name: Kambu Drinks
description: Kambu Drinks specializes in natural and organic beverages sourced locally from Ecuador.

name: La Fabril
description: La Fabril is one of Ecuador's leading companies in the production of edible oils, fats, and other food products.

name: Comercial Kley
description: Comercial Kley is a well-established company in the wholesale distribution of building materials and hardware in Ecuador.

name: Fertec
description: Fertec is a company dedicated to the distribution of fertilizers and agricultural supplies, supporting the local farming industry.

name: Produbanco
description: Produbanco is a leading financial institution in Ecuador, offering a variety of banking services to businesses and individuals.

name: Corporación Favorita
description: Corporación Favorita is a prominent retail conglomerate in Ecuador, operating major supermarket chains and retail businesses.

name: Banco Pichincha
description: Banco Pichincha is a leading financial institution in Ecuador, offering a variety of banking services to businesses and individuals.
